backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend for the ICP canister.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features: single break stop flow, traveling sound effect, break point arrival sound, system alert sound, and campfire arrival sound, each mapped to specific frontend files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files describing an RV journey experience with single break stop, water-themed activities, sound effects, and various overlays including halt issue quiz and campfire celebration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, defining a warm desert/road-trip color palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference, titled 'Interactive RV Driver-View Website with 3 Checkpoints and Action Choices'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the RVExperience component within a full-height container.
frontend/src/components/rv/ActionPlaybac: Empty file placeholder for action playback component (no implementation present).
frontend/src/components/rv/AnimatedTrave: Component that crossfades through four scene images with Ken Burns pan/zoom effects as a fallback when video playback fails.
frontend/src/components/rv/BreakStopReac: Modal overlay announcing break stop arrival with MapPin badge, RV emoji animation, and continue button, playing break-point-reached.mp3 sound effect on mount.
frontend/src/components/rv/CampfireEndSc: Celebration overlay for reaching the campfire destination with flame animations, RV badge award message, and campfire-arrival.mp3 sound effect.
frontend/src/components/rv/CheckpointOve: Empty file placeholder for checkpoint overlay component (no implementation present).
frontend/src/components/rv/checkpoints.t: Defines TypeScript interfaces and data for three checkpoint stops (Rest Stop, Scenic Overlook, Campground) with actions that have water consumption values.
frontend/src/components/rv/ClickToContin: Full-screen clickable overlay with pulsing button displaying customizable continue message and chevron icon.
frontend/src/components/rv/JourneyHaltIs: Dramatic failure overlay with animated visual indicators (drips, warning lights) and multiple-choice quiz to identify 'Resource tank empty' as the correct issue, playing thud, alert, and issue sound effects with inline feedback for wrong answers.
frontend/src/components/rv/ProgressIndic: Displays a fixed-position progress bar and status indicator showing the current journey state, progress percentage, and break stop count with appropriate icons and styling based on flow state.
frontend/src/components/rv/RVBadgeCelebr: Shows a celebratory overlay when the RV badge is earned, featuring animated award icon, congratulations message, and a button to continue to the destination.
Main orchestrator component that manages the RV journey flow state machine, renders appropriate scenes based on current state, handles auto-advancement logic, and controls sound effects for traveling and campfire arrival.
frontend/src/components/rv/scenes.ts: Exports scene data arrays with background images and descriptions for four journey scenes, plus special scenes for halt-issue and campfire destination.
frontend/src/components/rv/StartJourneyS: Initial screen displaying journey overview with RV emoji, trip details (1 break stop), instructions about limited visibility, and a start button to begin the adventure.
frontend/src/components/rv/TravelScene.t: Renders a static scene with a background image, gradient overlay, and bottom-left positioned title and description text with backdrop blur styling.
frontend/src/components/rv/TravelTransit: Displays a loading transition screen with spinner and animated dots when moving between break stops or arriving at the destination.
frontend/src/components/rv/TravelVideoSc: Plays a looping travel video with health monitoring (stall detection, playback timeout), automatically falls back to animated scene if video fails, and triggers callbacks on timer completion or user click.
Final completion screen showing journey summary statistics, a restart button, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution and copyright notice.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor for backend communication, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login, logout, and identity management using DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useRVFlow.ts: Custom hook managing RV journey flow state machine with transitions between start, traveling, break-stop, halt-issue, celebration, and destination states.
frontend/src/hooks/useSfx.ts: React hook for managing HTML5 audio playback with configurable volume and loop options, providing play and stop controls.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom warm desert/road-trip color palette using OKLCH color space, plus text shadow utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme with custom colors (using OKLCH), shadows, animations, and keyframes for accordion, fade, and slide effects.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking journey flow architecture with single breakpoint, system alert on user click, and audio enhancements at key journey moments.
